titles.title: Great is the Lord, He is Holy and Just - C

properties.copyright: Â©1982 Meadowgreen Music Company, Administered by EMI Christian Music Publishing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Great is the Lord,
He is holy and just,
By His power we trust in His love.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord,
He is faithful and true,
By His mercy He proves He is God.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord,
and worthy of glory.
Great is the Lord,
and worthy of praise.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Great is the Lord,
Now lift up your voice,
Now lift up your voice,
Great is the Lord,
Great is the Lord.
